attribute.name: stringlistitem-highlighted-foreground-color
attribute.description: The text color of the currently focused entry.

attribute.name: stringlistitem-foreground-color
attribute.description: The text color of a normal non-focused entry.

attribute.name: stringlistitem-highlighted-background-color
attribute.description: The background color of the currently focused entry.

attribute.name: stringlistitem-background-color
attribute.description: The background color of a normal non-focused entry.
